content.rendered:
Academic advisors play a crucial role in supporting military-affiliated prospective applicants and currently enrolled students in exploring academic pathways to degree attainment. Select advisors also provide essential support to the School Certifying Officials (SCOs) with course certifications for VA benefits.

Current students should always consult with their academic advisor in their chosen major (as assigned in your degree audit, MyDegree Tracker) (How to). However, if you need urgent assistance, the professional academic advisors listed below can provide limited support. Each advisor represents either a college or a campus (listed in alphabetical order).

Prospective military-affiliated applicants with general advising or degree questions, including those needing an educational plan for VA or Active Duty Tuition Assistance (TA) purposes, can reach out to an advisor below based on college affiliation or campus.

Contact us if you have questions: advisingmilitary@laverne.edu.
